entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets before morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
